Pithole, ma ọ bukwa Pithole City, by ámá mmuo nọr na ime Cornplanter Township, na Venango County, ime nkeji obodo US nke Pennsylvania
Ó rùrù mile 6 shí Oil Creek State park na Drake Well Museum, ébé mmanu crude bụzor fụtá na áhiá na ụwa nile
Otu mádu na ime Pithole shi tó bukwa òtù ọgụgụ ha shi da
Na otu Pithole nọr ka ébé òlìlé ihe ngwa-áhiá mmanu crude mèrè ka oke ndi madu shi ma ya.
